# Code ExampleHere's a code block with escaped notation:```js// [!code highlight:1-3]export function foo() {  const a = "Hello World"  return a}```And here's one without escaping (should not be transformed):```js// [!code highlight:1-3]export function bar() {  const b = "Goodbye World"  return b}```The transformer should only remove the backslash from `[!code` patterns.
